name: KubuSmart
0:
”Alexa, ask kubu smart the status of all the doors”
”Alexa, ask kubu smart the battery level for my front door”
”Alexa, ask kubu smart when was the front door last locked”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kubu smart
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill is used to know the status of the Kubu Smart Sensors telling you whether they are locked or unlocked and giving you the battery health of each door.
